set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "air4" );
use ( "sm_mullins" );

affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	use ( "tCockpitdoor" );
	wait ( 100.000 );

	task ( "ml1" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_ANNOUNCER, "sound/npc/mullins/air4/05warnshop.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "AIR4_006" );
	}

	dowait ( "ml1" );
	use ( "shop1a" );
	use ( "hansen" );
	use ( "guy1" );
	use ( "guy3" );
}
